title: 3 learnings to work better with Tech | by Giovanni Luca Randisi | home24 technology | May, 2022 - Medium
content: 3 learnings to work better with Tech | by Giovanni Luca Randisi | home24 technology | May, 2022  Medium
description: It has been almost two years since I moved from a Business Leadership position as a Marketing Director to one in Tech as VP Product.
